response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a significant asset to you, aligning well with your needs and aspirations. We understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and considering its intrinsic value to us, we propose a transaction price of $1,350,000. This offer represents a strategic balance between fair market valuation and a favorable deal for both parties. We look forward to discussing this further and exploring how this product can contribute to your endeavors. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
